generalEnglish_para: Our qualified teachers and experienced staff  help students to prepare for social English, career improvement and education. Students will work on all four main language skills of reading, writing, listening and speaking along with grammar, pronunciation and vocabulary.
cambridge_para: Our IELTS preparation course will develop your skills for taking the IELTS exam. This course is suitable for those students who want to prepare for the IELTS examination as it will help them to practise all four skills; Listening, speaking, reading and writing as well as grammar and vocabulary needed for the exam.
